page.title: 33Education
page.content:
There are six infant schools with an average of 150 pupils , nine Junior schools (average 250) and three Senior schools ( average 700) in the area. Also there is a college which teaches you more things once you’ve left senior school. At college, you can choose different courses depending on what job to do. If you do A levels, you get a better chance to do a better job. You don’t have to go to college if you don’t want to.
Stephanie and Sam
